Earner has earned Social Media Level 1 and 2 at this meeting prior to this badge. This meeting also conducted virtual trainings on iSafe, MobileMinds, and ClassroomVR. This earner has a commitment to professional development and is able to set goals concerning his or her growth. This badge represents .1 CEU/DLC of Leadership.
